thread.title: Begu wins in Moscow while Kerber withdraws
thread.title_full: Begu wins in Moscow while Kerber withdraws

author: senh
title: Begu wins in Moscow while Kerber withdraws
text: BING NEWS: Begu Wins in Moscow While Kerber Withdraws Last year's runner-up Irina-Camelia Begu was among the winners on the first day of main draw play at the Kremlin Cup on Monday, while Angelique Kerber withdrew from the tournament. Romania's Begu, seeded seventh, was made to work hard in a 6-1, 7-6 (2), 6 ... 10/19/2015 - 5:40 am | View Link Lucie Safarova v Irina-Camelia Begu WTA New Haven Cup 2015 preview and match time: Safarova starts off favourite Safarova made the final after registering wins over Sabine Lisicki ... 6-2 victory and will now hope to repeat her showing from their semi-final encounter at Moscow last year. That match went to three sets but Begu went on to defeat Safarova 7-6, 1-6 ... 08/24/2015 - 10:55 pm | View Link Result: Irina-Camelia Begu dumps Angelique Kerber out in Rome Ninth-seed Angelique Kerber has been knocked out of the Italian Open at the second-round stage by Irina-Camelia Begu. Germany's Kerber began slowly as Begu broke to 15 in the opening game, but the match was soon level again as Kerber hit straight back. 05/13/2015 - 6:03 am | View Link Pavlyuchenkova, Begu showdown in Moscow MOSCOW: Sixth-seeded Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova of Russia beat Katerina Siniakova in straight sets Saturday to set up a Kremlin Cup final against Irina-Camelia Begu of Romania. Pavlyuchenkova dominated the Czech qualifier from start to finish, winning 6-2, 6 ... 10/18/2014 - 6:57 am | View Link Titanic Kremlin Cup: Irina-Camelia Begu to meet Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova in Moscow final Irina Camelia-Begu will meet Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova in the Kremlin Cup final after both players recorded straight-set wins on Saturday. The Romanian just edged a hard-fought clash with Lucie Safarova 7-6 (7-5) 1-6 6-3, while Pavlyuchenkova reached her ...
